original: myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par bya'i /
analyzed: myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes par bya'i /
translated: daughters of a good family should be known to quickly pass into complete nirvāṇa.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: Those who are śrāvakas or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan dag la spyod pa de dag ni /
translated: pratyekabuddhas, who practice other sūtras that are devoid of the perfection of wisdom,

original: de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not do so.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /
translated: It is because those who are followers of faith and those who are followers of reality, those who are stream enterers, once-returners, non-returners,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang la bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslab par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang la bslab nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
translated: the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag phul gyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher @218a *//
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yang dag phul gyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las rgya cher @218a *//
translated: and the highest Dharma, which is taught extensively in this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in which the bodhisattvas should train,🔽and in which the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas have trained and attained perfect buddhahood,🔽and will attain perfect buddhahood.”

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One, we will also protect, guard, and defend those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who uphold this profound perfection of wisdom, who read it, who recite it, who explain it, who teach it, who chant it, who recite it, and who uphold it in the right way.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: it is like this:

original: che ba lags so //
analyzed: che ba lags so //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is a great perfection.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: it is like this:

original: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang; pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang; pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags so //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is an unequaled perfection, an immeasurable perfection, an incalculable perfection, a perfection equal to the unequaled.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /
translated: those who follow faith in this perfection of wisdom, those who follow reality, the eighth, the stream enterers, the once returners, the nonreturners, the arhats, the pratyekabuddhas, and the bodhisattvas, and the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas—

original: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab pas nges par byung bar gyur la /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab pas nges par byung bar gyur la / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni /
translated: the arhats and pratyekabuddhas have emerged through training in it,🔽and the bodhisattva great beings have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through training in it.

original: bri ba'am / gang ba ma mchis so //
analyzed: bri ba'am / gang ba ma mchis so //
translated: But this profound perfection of wisdom is not diminished or filled up

original: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
analyzed: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
translated: by that.”

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la @218b mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la @218b mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste /
translated: Then the gods living in the desire realm and the gods living in the form realm bowed their heads to the feet of the Lord, circumambulated the Lord three times, and then left the Lord’s presence.

original: de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te /
analyzed: de dag ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te /
translated: Having gone not very far, they disappeared.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who are sons of gods in the desire realm

original: 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do //
translated: are established in the desire realm.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who are sons of gods in the form realm

original: gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do //
translated: are established in the form realm.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Where did the bodhisattva great beings who immediately on hearing this deep perfection of wisdom will believe it die and transfer to be reborn here?”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur te /🔽zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /🔽yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur te / zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings who immediately on hearing this deep perfection of wisdom will believe it🔽will not be cowed,🔽will not be overwhelmed,

original: de yid rtul bar mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de yid rtul bar mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: and will not be disheartened,

original: de yid gnyis mi byed la the tshom mi za zhing /
analyzed: de yid gnyis mi byed la the tshom mi za zhing /
translated: They do not have any doubts or uncertainties about it.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par mngon par dga' ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par mngon par dga' ste /
translated: They are delighted to hear this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: thos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yid la byed pa 'di nyid dad mi 'bral zhing /
analyzed: thos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yid la byed pa 'di nyid dad mi 'bral zhing /
translated: Having heard it, they do not part from this very attention to the deep perfection of wisdom.

original: 'gro'ang rung / 'ong yang rung /🔽'greng yang rung /
analyzed: 'gro'ang rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung /
translated: Whether they are going or coming,

original: 'dug kyang rung ste /
analyzed: 'dug kyang rung ste /
translated: whether they are standing or sitting,

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa de dag mi gtong la /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la byed pa de dag mi gtong la /
translated: they do not give up that attention.

original: chos smra bas gang zag de dag @219a *//
analyzed: chos smra bas gang zag de dag @219a *//
translated: The dharma bhāṇakas follow after those persons

original: gi phyi bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ste /
analyzed: gi phyi bzhin du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'brang ste /
translated: and constantly attend on them.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like

original: dper na / ba drus ma be'u mi gtong ba bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na / ba drus ma be'u mi gtong ba bzhin du /
translated: a cow that does not abandon her calf.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, too, do not abandon this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: nam lus la gnas par byas pa dang / zin pa dang / byang ba dang / chub par bklags pa dang / yid kyis brtags pa dang / mthong bas shin tu rtogs par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i phyir chos smra ba mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag de ni /
analyzed: nam lus la gnas par byas pa dang / zin pa dang / byang ba dang / chub par bklags pa dang / yid kyis brtags pa dang / mthong bas shin tu rtogs par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i phyir chos smra ba mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag de ni /
translated: and when he has not yet understood this profound perfection of wisdom by means of his body, by means of his grasp, by means of his understanding, by means of his comprehension, by means of his investigation, and by means of his insight, then that Bodhisattva, that great being, who does not give up the preacher of dharma for the sake of this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: rab 'byor / mi las shi 'phos nas mir skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi las shi 'phos nas mir skyes pa yin no //
translated: Subhuti, has been reborn as a human after having died in the human realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des /
analyzed: 'di ltar / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des /
translated: Because that Bodhisattva, that great being, who is a beginner,

original: sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris la /
analyzed: sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris la /
translated: has previously written out this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: bris nas kyang glegs bam du chud par byas te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang byas /🔽bla mar byas /
analyzed: bris nas kyang glegs bam du chud par byas te me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bsti stang byas / bla mar byas /
translated: Having written it down, they will make a book of it, and will honor, revere, and worship it with flowers, incense, perfumes, garlands, creams, powders, clothes, parasols, flags, and banners.

original: ri mor byas /
analyzed: ri mor byas /
translated: They will honor it as a guru,🔽revere it,

original: mchod par byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mchod par byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: and worship it.

original: de ni / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi las shi 'phos te mir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi las shi 'phos te mir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of those wholesome roots, after they die they will be reborn as humans, and as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom they will believe in it.

original: rab 'byor gyis @219b gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis @219b gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de dag dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de dag dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis nas de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la /
translated: those bodhisattvas who have those good qualities, after they have attended on other lord buddhas, after they have died and passed from there, and have been reborn here, as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom they will believe in it.

original: mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam /
analyzed: mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis lags sam /
translated: and having written it out, they will also teach it in full, recite it, and properly pay attention to it?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'ang de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes te /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have attended on the lord buddhas in other buddhafields, after passing away from there, are reborn here,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos la /
translated: and as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom they will have confidence in it,

original: mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mos nas kyang yi ger 'bri ba dang / bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and having had confidence in it, they will write out, and having written it out, they will teach it in full, recite it, and properly pay attention to it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la /
analyzed: 'di ltar / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la /
translated: from those buddha bhagavāns,

original: thos nas kyang bzung zhing bcangs la /
analyzed: thos nas kyang bzung zhing bcangs la /
translated: and having heard it, has taken it up,🔽and having taken it up, has borne it in mind,

original: kha ton du byas shing tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: kha ton du byas shing tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: and having borne it in mind, has recited it, and having recited it, has🔽understood it correctly.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir @220a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir @220a *//
translated: Because of those wholesome roots and that attention,🔽he has been born here.

original: skyes so // rab 'byor /
analyzed: skyes so // rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'dir skyes pa de nyid kyang yon tan de dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'dir skyes pa de nyid kyang yon tan de dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: you should know that the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has died and passed away from among the Tuṣita devas and has been born here with the good fortune to be human also has those qualities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su dri ba byas pas na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su dri ba byas pas na /
translated: Subhūti, it is because that bodhisattva great being has asked the bodhisattva great being Maitreya about this perfection of wisdom.

original: de ni / dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni / dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He has been born here because of that wholesome root.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who has not heard this deep perfection of wisdom and has not asked about it from the beginning will

original: mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na /
analyzed: mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na /
translated: be born in the human world

original: the tshom can dang / yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: the tshom can dang / yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
translated: and will be doubtful and slow-witted.

original: de'i sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: His mind will be downcast.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos la yongs su dri ba byas pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mtha' nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos la yongs su dri ba byas pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who has heard this deep perfection of wisdom and has asked about it from the beginning will

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na /🔽the tshom can du mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na / the tshom can du mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: When they hear this profound perfection of wisdom being taught,🔽they will not be doubtful,

original: yid rtul bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yid rtul bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: they will not be slow-witted,

original: sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will not be discouraged.

original: rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu @220b phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu @220b phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: Subhūti, the same goes for the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, and the perfection of morality.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
translated: Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being who has not heard this perfection of wisdom, who has not asked questions about it, and who has not heard it explained before,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na /🔽the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na / the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: when they hear this profound perfection of wisdom being taught,🔽will be doubtful,

original: yid rtul bar 'gyur te; sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid rtul bar 'gyur te; sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: will be slow-witted, and their minds will be discouraged.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos shing /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, those Bodhisattvas who have not heard of the emptiness of internal phenomena, etc. to: the emptiness of the nonexistence of own-being, from the beginning,🔽

original: yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
analyzed: yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have not heard about the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, and have not asked questions about them,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na /🔽the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /🔽yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na / the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
translated: when they hear this exposition of the profound perfection of wisdom,🔽will be doubtful,🔽will be slow-witted,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will become disheartened.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ma thos la yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have not heard about the four applications of mindfulness, and have not asked questions about them,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /🔽yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas the tshom can du 'gyur zhing / yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
translated: when they hear this exposition of the profound perfection of wisdom, will be doubtful,🔽will be slow-witted,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will become disheartened.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga @221a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga @221a *//
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have not heard about the four right efforts, the four legs of magical power, the five faculties,

original: dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos sam /
analyzed: dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos sam /
translated: the five powers, the seven limbs of awakening, and the eightfold noble path, or

original: thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na /🔽the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos na / the tshom can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: who, having heard about them, have not asked questions about them, when they hear this deep perfection of wisdom being explained🔽they will be doubtful

original: yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yid rtul bar 'gyur te /
translated: and will be slow-witted,

original: sems kyang zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems kyang zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will be downcast.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dris la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dris la /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have heard this deep perfection of wisdom and have asked questions about it in the past

original: thos shing yongs su dris nas nyi ma gcig gam /
analyzed: thos shing yongs su dris nas nyi ma gcig gam /
translated: having heard and asked about it, they do not practice and do not cultivate this deep perfection of wisdom for one day,

original: nyi ma gnyis sam /
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis sam /
translated: or two days,

original: nyi ma gsum mam /
analyzed: nyi ma gsum mam /
translated: or three,

original: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
analyzed: bzhi'am / lnga'am /
translated: or four, or five,

original: drug gam / nyi ma bcur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyams su mi len cing mi sgom pa de ni; 'phrog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: drug gam / nyi ma bcur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyams su mi len cing mi sgom pa de ni; 'phrog par 'gyur te /
translated: or six, or ten days, they will be robbed of it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will be separated from this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar /
translated: Subhūti, it is because

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la res 'ga' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la res 'ga' ni /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who sometimes

original: 'dun par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dun par 'gyur te /
translated: are keen on

original: res 'ga' ni /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni /
translated: and sometimes

original: 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de ni /
analyzed: 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de ni /
translated: are not keen on this deep perfection of wisdom

original: 'phrog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'phrog par 'gyur te /
translated: will be robbed of it,

original: shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du blo shin tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du blo shin tu mi brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because their minds are very unstable, like cotton fluff.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings

original: theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring po ma @221b lon pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring po ma @221b lon pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be known that they have not long set out in the vehicle, have not been taken hold of by spiritual friends, and have not attended on the perfect Buddha.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos /
translated: “Subhūti, it should be known that bodhisattva great beings who have not received this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: kha ton du ma byas /
analyzed: kha ton du ma byas /
translated: have not recited it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: have not properly paid attention to it, have not trained in the perfection of wisdom, have not trained in the perfection of concentration, have not trained in the perfection of perseverance, have not trained in the perfection of patience, have not trained in the perfection of morality, and have not trained in the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la ma bslab pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslab pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la ma bslab pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa dang /
translated: they have not trained in the perfection of morality, they have not trained in the perfection of generosity, they have not trained in inner emptiness, up to they have not trained in the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslab pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la ma bslab pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslab pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la ma bslab pa dang /
translated: they have not trained in the applications of mindfulness, they have not trained in the right efforts, they have not trained in the legs of miraculous power, they have not trained in the faculties, they have not trained in the powers, they have not trained in the branches of awakening, and they have not trained in the path,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rab 'byor / theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those bodhisattva great beings are newly set out in the vehicle.

original: @222a *// rab 'byor /
analyzed: @222a *// rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: those

original: dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa yin gyi /
translated: have only faith and only joy,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / bklag pa dang / lung nod pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / bklag pa dang / lung nod pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so //
translated: but are not able to write out, read aloud, clearly articulate, contemplate, or properly pay attention to this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti, those sons of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed /🔽lung nod par mi byed /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed / lung nod par mi byed /
translated: “Noble sons and daughters of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom,🔽who do not take it up,

original: kha ton du mi byed /
analyzed: kha ton du mi byed /
translated: who do not recite it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang nyams su mi len pa dang /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin par mi byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'ang nyams su mi len pa dang /
translated: who do not properly pay attention to it, who do not take up this deep perfection of wisdom, up to and do not take up the knowledge of all aspects, who do not practice this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, connect this as before,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nyams su mi len pa de dag ni /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nyams su mi len pa de dag ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: up to and do not practice the knowledge of all aspects,🔽they will be one of two types of persons:

original: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / sa rnam pa 'di gnyis las gcig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / sa rnam pa 'di gnyis las gcig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is because, noble sons and daughters,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni /🔽sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing lung ma mnos te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni / sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger ma bris shing lung ma mnos te /
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family🔽have not written out this profound perfection of wisdom in the past, have not received it orally,🔽

original: kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu @222b phyin pa 'dis kyang yongs su ma zin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su ma blangs pa'i phyir te /🔽de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: kha ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu @222b phyin pa 'dis kyang yongs su ma zin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyams su ma blangs pa'i phyir te / de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family have not written out, have not received, have not recited, have not mastered, have not properly paid attention to, and have not been taken hold of by this perfection of wisdom, and those bodhisattva great beings have not trained in this perfection of wisdom either.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag sa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag sa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, you should know that those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family will be of two kinds.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Eighteen Thousand Lines,

original: 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: the chapter called “The Assembly,”

original: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
translated: the forty-fourth.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dper na / gang gi tshe rgya mtsho'i gru zhig par gyur pa na /
analyzed: dper na / gang gi tshe rgya mtsho'i gru zhig par gyur pa na /
translated: when a ship in the ocean breaks up,

original: de'i nang na mi 'khod pa dag gis shing ngam /
analyzed: de'i nang na mi 'khod pa dag gis shing ngam /
translated: Those who are not in the water will be on the trees.

original: rkyal pa'am / mi ro la ma 'jus shing ma bzung na /
analyzed: rkyal pa'am / mi ro la ma 'jus shing ma bzung na /
translated: Those who do not hold on to a log, a plank, or a corpse will, Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
translated: know that those people

original: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / rgya mtsho'i gru zhig pa na mi gang dag shing ngam; rkyal pa'am /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / rgya mtsho'i gru zhig pa na mi gang dag shing ngam; rkyal pa'am /
translated: will die before reaching the shore.

original: mi ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed na /
analyzed: mi ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin par byed na /
translated: Subhūti, those people on the wrecked ship who hold on to a log, a plank, or a corpse🔽will, Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mi de dag ni /
translated: know that those people

original: rgya mtsho'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i nang du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: will not die in the ocean.

original: bde bar rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: bde bar rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will safely cross the ocean

original: nye zho med par thang la gnas par 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: nye zho med par thang la gnas par 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and reach dry land without harm.

original: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'bri bar mi byed /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have only faith and only joy

original: lung nod par mi byed /
analyzed: lung nod par mi byed /
translated: but do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom, do not receive it in full,

original: kha ton du mi byed /
analyzed: kha ton du mi byed /
translated: They do not recite them.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽bsam gtan gyi @223a *//
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te / bsam gtan gyi @223a *//
translated: They do not properly pay attention to them.🔽Similarly, they do not write out the perfection of concentration,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'bri bar mi byed /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'bri bar mi byed /
translated: the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, or the perfection of giving.

original: lung nod par mi byed /🔽kha ton du mi byed /
analyzed: lung nod par mi byed / kha ton du mi byed /
translated: They do not receive them orally.🔽They do not recite them.

analyzed: lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i mdo sde yi ger 'bri bar mi byed / lung nod par mi byed /

original: kha ton du mi byed /
analyzed: kha ton du mi byed /

analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed pa dang / lhag par dmigs par mi byed pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: “Subhūti, those persons who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who are not properly paying attention, and who are not paying attention to the special point,

original: bar ma dor lam du nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bar ma dor lam du nyon mongs par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang /
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽“Subhūti, those persons who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, who have faith, who have patience, who have clarity,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / 'dod pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / 'dod pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag ni /
translated: who have a higher motivation, who have a desire, who have a belief, who have a generosity, and who have an indefatigable perseverance, in order to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'bri bar byed / lung nod par byed /

original: rab 'byor / rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: legs so // rab 'byor /

translated: they give gifts with a mindstream that has fallen into the view of ‘I’ and ‘mine.’

original: tshul khrims gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom pa de'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom par byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom pa de'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom par byed do //
translated: Whatever morality they guard, whatever patience they cultivate, whatever effort they make, whatever meditation they cultivate, whatever wisdom they cultivate, they cultivate it with a mind that has fallen into the view of “I” and “mine.”

original: sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na /
analyzed: sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na /

original: 'di snyam du sems te /🔽bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no //
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te / bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no //
translated: they think like this:🔽“I am giving a gift.

analyzed: sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o //

analyzed: bdag ni / sbyin pa dang ldan no // bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo //

analyzed: bdag gis tshul khrims bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: bdag ni / tshul khrims dang ldan no // bdag gis bzod par bya'o //
translated: I am moral.🔽I am being patient.

original: bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //

original: bdag ni / bzod pa dang ldan no //🔽bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams so //
analyzed: bdag ni / bzod pa dang ldan no // bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams so //
translated: I am patient.🔽I am making an effort.

original: bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o //
translated: I am making this effort.

original: bdag ni / brtson 'grus dang ldan no //🔽bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /
analyzed: bdag ni / brtson 'grus dang ldan no // bdag bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /
translated: I am energetic.🔽I am absorbed in concentration.

original: bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam gtan bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate concentration.

original: bdag ni / bsam gtan dang ldan no //🔽bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo //
analyzed: bdag ni / bsam gtan dang ldan no // bdag gis shes rab bsgom mo //
translated: I am concentrated.🔽I will cultivate wisdom.

original: bdag gis shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o //

original: bdag ni / shes rab dang ldan no //🔽snyam ste / de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni / shes rab dang ldan no // snyam ste / de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do //
translated: I am wise.🔽He becomes conceited because of that generosity.

original: sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed do //
translated: He becomes conceited about that generosity.

original: bdag gi sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi sbyin pa'o //
translated: This is my generosity.

original: snyam du rlom sems su byed @228a *//
analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed @228a *//
translated: He becomes conceited about that.

original: do; ;de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: do; ;de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rlom sems su byed do //
translated: Similarly, he becomes conceited about morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed do //
translated: He becomes conceited about wisdom.

original: bdag gi shes rab bo //
analyzed: bdag gi shes rab bo //
translated: This is my wisdom.

original: snyam du rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed do //
translated: He becomes conceited about that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
translated: Because in the perfection of generosity

original: rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: there are no such conceptual thoughts.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of generosity

original: pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the perfection of the far shore.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni /
translated: In the perfection of morality

original: rnam par rtog pa de dag med do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa de dag med do //
translated: those conceptualizations do not exist.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang de bzhin du rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o //
translated: In the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom, those conceptualizations do not arise.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Why is that?🔽The perfection of wisdom

original: pha mthar phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: pha mthar phyin pa yin no //
translated: is the perfection of the far shore.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni /🔽pha mtha' yang mi shes /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni / pha mtha' yang mi shes /
translated: The one practicing the Bodhisattva Vehicle🔽does not know the far shore,

original: pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: does not know the other shore,

original: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /
analyzed: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin la /
translated: not embraced by the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma zin pas /
translated: and not embraced by up to the knowledge of all aspects,

analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: they will fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges @228b par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ji ltar thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na / rab 'byor / 'di la rigs kyi bu'am /

original: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pas thog ma kho nar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing /
translated: Subhūti, here sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle, unskilled in means, first of all give gifts🔽and

original: thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung par byed /🔽thabs la mi mkhas pas bzod pa sgom par byed /🔽thabs la mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed /
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung par byed / thabs la mi mkhas pas bzod pa sgom par byed / thabs la mi mkhas pas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed /
translated: “They practice discipline without skill in means.🔽They cultivate patience without skill in means.🔽They practice diligence without skill in means.

original: thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed /
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed /

original: thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab sgom par byed cing /
analyzed: thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab sgom par byed cing /

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: They think,

analyzed: bdag gis sbyin pa sbyin no // 'di la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: ‘I am practicing generosity.🔽I am giving to this person.

original: sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa 'di sbyin par bya'o //
translated: I am practicing this generosity.

original: bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo //🔽bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis tshul khrims bsrung ngo // bdag gis bzod pa bsgom mo //
translated: I am practicing discipline.🔽I am cultivating patience.

original: bdag gis brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: bdag gis brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: I am practicing diligence.

original: bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //

original: bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis shes rab bsgom par bya'o //

original: shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o //🔽snyam ste; de sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed /🔽sbyin pas rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o // snyam ste; de sbyin pa de rlom sems su byed / sbyin pas rlom sems su byed /
translated: I am practicing this wisdom.’🔽They are conceited about their generosity.🔽They are conceited about generosity.

original: bdag ni / sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni / sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They think, ‘I am generous.’

analyzed: bzod pas rlom sems su byed /

analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed do // brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed / brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed /

original: bdag ni / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
translated: they become conceited thinking, ‘I am persevering,’

original: snyam du rlom sems su byed do //🔽bsam gtan rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed do // bsam gtan rlom sems su byed /
translated: and so they become conceited.🔽They become conceited about concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed /

original: bdag ni / bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni / bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o //

original: snyam du rlom sems su byed do //🔽shes rab rlom sems su byed /🔽shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed do // shes rab rlom sems su byed / shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed /

original: bdag ni / shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni / shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
translated: they become conceited thinking, ‘I am wise,’

analyzed: snyam du rlom sems su byed do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the perfection of generosity is free of conceptualization, just as it is conceptualized.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

translated: the perfection of generosity🔽is the perfection of the end.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: In the same way, it is because

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: the perfection of wisdom

original: pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha mthar phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the perfection of the end.

original: de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do //
analyzed: de ji ltar rnam par rtog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is free of the conceptualization that conceptualizes it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni /
translated: It is because🔽the perfection of wisdom

original: pha mthar phyin pa yin na /
analyzed: pha mthar phyin pa yin na /
translated: is the perfection of the end.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni /🔽pha mtha' yang mi shes /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni / pha mtha' yang mi shes /
translated: those who belong to the Bodhisattva Vehicle🔽do not know the end,

original: pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha rol kyang mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and do not know the other side.

original: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ni / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar te /
